profile_positions.title: Senior Project Manager and Program Manager

profile_positions.description:
Stadgenoot will move its complete administration into a standardized ERP system. At the same time they will adopt the CORA market standard as their working processes. I was asked to ensure that the surrounding application landscape fits well with the new ERP system Tobias AX and that information can be exchanged. In addition, the infrastructure, authorizations and the document management system fall within my responsibility,

At the start of the project, it appears that the project was not yet fully set up and I have tried to reduce risks during the implementation of the project by giving advice and coaching to the rest of the project team.
profile_positions.title: Project Manager (via KWD)

profile_positions.description:
Transavia has improved its HR processes and replaced the supporting IT systems. As part of the project, the existing HR system EMIS/Emplaza was replaced by the cloud-based solution Workday. This project was carried out on the basis of Best Value Procurement under the supervision of a KWD colleague. During the final phase of the project, there is a need for a Data Migration Lead. I filled this role.

I defined the data migration process in a very short period of time and executed it with a small team. My hands-on mentality has helped to complete the process steps of cleaning, collecting, transforming, loading and checking data quickly and efficiently. More than 3,000 internal and external Transavia employees can view and update their existing personnel file in the new HR system, Workday.
profile_positions.title: Data Migration Lead (via KWD)

profile_positions.description:
PrivaZorg is a nationwide home care organization that wants to use an electronic client file (ECD) for all 1,000 clients who receive care and/or nursing. The care providers must be provided with a mobile device to consult and supplement the ECD.

PrivaZorg has been using the myCaress product for some time for care registration. After a short market survey, it was decided to also use the ECD module of myCaress. In addition, iPads have been chosen as mobile devices that are managed remotely using VMware AirWatch.

During the project, many field representatives were consulted to determine and later test the configuration of the ECD. The use has been extensively tested in practice, after which the full implementation has taken place.

To help the organization with this large and complex project, I regularly rolled up my sleeves and showed how projects are carried out on the basis of exemplary behaviour.

More than 1,000 clients have a digital client file. 750 care providers and care coordinators are equipped with an iPad and trained to consult and supplement the digital client file. All supporting processes are set up and operational.
profile_positions.title: Project Manager ECD (via KWD)

profile_positions.description:
PrivaZorg is a nationwide home care organization that wants to professionalize their ICT. A number of projects have been started. I managed these projects (4 to 8) simultaneously.

The organizational structure of PrivaZorg is characterized by approximately 35 independent regional offices (franchises) and approximately 1,500 independent care providers (zzp'ers). This creates a large and complex playing field with different interests and agendas. I have guarded and influenced this political playing field without losing sight of the central goal.

In addition, I have helped to further professionalize the project organization, so that the organization can carry out projects independently after completing my assignment.

Several projects have been successfully completed and put into use. This allows the organization to e-mail securely, report (care) incidents, manage contracts better, set digital indications and the quality manual is easier to use.
profile_positions.title: Multi Project Manager (via KWD)

profile_positions.description:
Auping is moving towards an omni-channel strategy. The first step is the introduction of a webshop for the bedding & textile range. Together with the newly recruited e-commerce manager, I set up the online sales channel and the new e-commerce department.

During the technical POC, most of the architecture was already determined as Auping was transferring most of the ERP landscape to Microsoft AX. During the realization phase, a few additional components (including SANA and Drupal) were added, resulting in a relatively large number of components and associated suppliers for such a project. Due to the loss of the project manager of the POC, I had to start without a transfer, with my major challenge being to maintain the original go-live date.

After a phase of exploration and research, I aligned all parts of the organization and created a common picture of the project goal. I was able to provide all parties with the right information at the right time so that there were no delays caused by waiting parties. However, this meant a loss of time for the organization compared to the desired go-live date, but the webshop performed above expectations from the start.

The Auping webshop was launched in the Netherlands in October 2016 via www.auping.com. I took over this project and under constant time pressure ensured that the organization and suppliers were aligned. Together we realized the technical webshop, the internal organization and the logistics fulfilment.
profile_positions.title: Project Manager Webshop Bedding & Textile (via KWD)

profile_positions.description:
Unilever has decided to implement Product Lifecycle Management (PLM) to manage the specifications of its entire product portfolio. A program has been set up to develop and implement PLM within R&D. For R&D this is the largest change program ever and the experience with change programs is limited.

As a business change manager, I was responsible for the continuous exploration of how to properly manage this change in a way that suits Unilever and R&D in particular. The current and new process are mapped out together with the various business units and the change is made transparent.

The challenge of this assignment lies mainly in managing the interests of the various business units with regard to ongoing innovations on the one hand and the required commitment to the change program on the other. I exactly knew how to move in this political landscape and to get all parties involved with my proposals.

With a structured approach that is and remains practically applicable, the use of the new process is steadily increasing. Users support each other using Salesforce Chatter and the support organization is set up. The organization is ready for the last release in 2016/2017.
profile_positions.title: Change Manager Product Lifecycle Management (via KWD)

profile_positions.description:
The program in which Product Lifecycle Management (PLM) is implemented was looking for means to stay in control of the program and the underlying projects. I set up and managed the Program Management Office at the start of the program.

A governance structure with control mechanisms for time, money, quality, scope and information management. This structure is currently still used in the Program Management Office.
profile_positions.title: PMO Product Lifecycle Management (via KWD)
